#summary ReleaseNotes for the MyISERN-XML Program.

= Introduction =
Contains documentation on milestones for the MyISERN-XML Program.

= October 15, 2007 Milestone =
 * Verify all data in XML files are valid.
 * Separated code that did not belong to other classes.
 * More command-line arguments to view data in XML files in different ways.
 * Improved testing.
 * Some GUI implementation started.
